content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: scaffolding
inventory=[{"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 8, "index": 14}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 19, "index": 15}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 20}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 6, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 50, "index": 38}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft scaffolding. Scaffolding requires placing 6 bamboo and 1 string side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the bamboo from slot 30 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Since the bamboo has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the string to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the string to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 2 with quantity 1
